title: Golden Filigree Necklace Set
materials: with intricate filigree work. The gold appears to have a subtle rose gold hue
possibly achieved through alloy composition or specific polishing techniques. Delicate gemstones are embedded in the piece
likely diamonds or cubic zirconia. Exquisite craftsmanship with a Hyderabadi finish.
features: The necklace showcases a complex, radiating design, possibly inspired by peacock feathers. The design includes meticulously crafted filigree patterns, featuring small stones or details within each 'feather' segment. The central pendant has a drop shape, with a corresponding design element above it, connected by graceful curves. The earrings mirror elements of the necklace, offering a harmonious design. Features a floral or 'butta' element at the top, with a teardrop or 'kundan' shape at the base, mimicking the necklace's pendant.
colors: with subtle color variations in the metal - a mix of yellow and rose gold
accented by the white sparkle of the gemstones.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for milestone events like 'half-saree' functions
description: This stunning necklace and earrings set seamlessly blends traditional design elements with a modern aesthetic. The intricate filigree work is a testament to the skill of our artisans, and the high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty. The set's unique design makes it a statement piece, perfect for those who appreciate elegance and sophistication.
